PickUp.QuestName: Good Help is Hard to Find

TurnIn.QuestName: Good Help is Hard to Find

Code.Code: await CommonCoroutines.StopMoving(); Me.BagItems.FirstOrDefault(x => x.Entry == 46856).Use(); await Coroutine.Wait(2000, () => Me.HasAura(66392));

Logging.Write(System.Windows.Media.Colors.Yellow, "[ProfileBase]: Disabling custom anti-stuck measures until this quest is complete."); AppDomain.CurrentDomain.SetData("QuestingProfiles_AntiStuckToggle", false);

PursueGameObject.PursueWhen: Unit(38187, u => u.IsAlive) != null && GAMEOBJECT.Location.DistanceSqr(Unit(38187, u => u.IsAlive).Location) <= 40f*40f
